title: Print, "Nouveau Recueil de Surrurerie dans le plus nouveau gout", ca. 1762
inscribed:
Imprinted at Center: Nouveau receuil de serrurerie dans le plus nouveau gout/Inventee et Dessine par Moreau 1762. A Paris chez Mondhare/Rue S. Jacques a L'Hotel Saumur.
Imprinted lower right: J. Pelletier, fecit, 1762.
provenance: From the Collection of Léon Decloux
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: Cartouche design surmounted with a coronet and flanked with a pair of extended wings

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Nouveau Recueil de Surrurerie dans le plus nouveau gout", ca. 1762.
ca. 1762. Sheet: 24.8 x 39.8 cm (9 3/4 x 15 11/16 in.). Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1921-6-226-1.
